column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: XMZHFNHBYJ

column.name: LXFS
column.option: 1|线上内核表决;2|线下内核表决

column.name: XMZFKNHBBS
column.describe: 项目组反馈内核办标识

restrictions.condition:
{"args":[{"expression":"parameter.DGYJ","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.XMLX","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.FQBM","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ","length":0,"scale":0,"type":13},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ_JS","length":0,"scale":0,"type":13}],"statement":"({0} IS NULL 
OR ({0} = 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHSP_NHCL WHERE lcIB_NHSP_ID = lcIB_NHSP.ID))
OR ({0} = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHSP_NHCL WHERE lcIB_NHSP_ID = lcIB_NHSP.ID)))
AND (lcIB_NHSP.XMLX = {1} OR {1} IS NULL)
AND (lcIB_NHSP.SQBM = {2} OR {2} IS NULL)
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(lcIB_NHSP.SQSJ,'YYYYMMDD')) >= {3} OR {3} IS NULL)
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(lcIB_NHSP.SQSJ,'YYYYMMDD')) <= {4} OR {4} IS NULL)","type":0}

command.describe: 上传全套内核材料扫描版
维护项目底稿移交信息
